text: Thompson RS is a news information
company provide Business Services legal
products and text products to clients
all over the globe my role is to review
architecture infrastructure and
applications we have and make them
compliant with security and governance
standards we propose in our long-term
strategic initiatives we have 25
000 employees and over 75 countries we
have hybrid and remote employees who
needs to authenticate to our systems
from different environment settings they
have the challenge we had was when user
authenticating from different devices
sometimes there were unsuccessful
attempts in order to address those there
were manual intervention by different
employees all over the globe what we
wanted to do is to automate that process
we approach AWS to understand their
offering counselors wanted to build
solution which can be reliable and
scalable so it was recommended that to
use Amazon Cloud watch Amazon cloudwatch
offers automated alerts and health
tracks so the way we have implemented it
if there's a fail twice in our alerts
then it automatically fill over to the
nearest region we have and the result of
it that we were able to save time from
manual failover to automation from 30
minutes to three minutes we were able to
save time from our engineers and
resources we have in place so they can
focus on other implementation and
value-added products we have I'm excited
for our next phase of observability with
AWS we have different solutions which we
are planning to migrate from on-prem to
Cloud as we move further we are going to
be focused more towards observability
increasing our monitoring using real
time blogs which cloudwatch offers so
that's what our next phase is going to
be
[Music]
